sentences.sContent: You could say that nail polish is preservative free!
sentences.sContent_eng: You could say that nail polish is preservative free!
sentences.sCn: 你可以说指甲油是一种免费的防腐剂。

sentences.sContent: It is the most widely-used preservative for vaccines.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is the most widely-used preservative for vaccines.
sentences.sCn: 它是一种最为使用广泛的疫苗防腐剂。

sentences.sContent: It is used as a preservative in certain acid food products.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is used as a preservative in certain acid food products.
sentences.sCn: 在某些酸性食物制品中它被使用作为防腐剂。

synos.tran: [助剂]防腐的；有保存力的；有保护性的

phrases.pCn: n. 防腐处理，防护处理

remMethod.val: pre(预先) + serv(保持) + ative(…的) → 预先用来保存的 → 防腐的

words.tran: 可保存的；可保管的；能储藏的
保护区；禁猎地；加工成的食品
保护者，保护人；保护剂，防腐剂；储藏柜
（对自然环境、古迹文物等的）保护主义者

trans.tranOther: a chemical substance that is used to prevent things from decaying, for example food or wood
